sentences.en: Anne and David are an ill - assorted pair.
sentences.cn: 安妮和戴维是不相配的一对.

sentences.en: Assorted fire pot is always a favorite with our customer.
sentences.cn: 我们的客人大多喜欢吃什锦火锅.

sentences.en: He has always assorted with men of his own age.
sentences.cn: 他总是和年令与自己相仿的人交往.

sentences.en: I recommend you a plate of assorted fresh fruits in season.
sentences.cn: 我向你们推荐一些时令的新鲜水果.

sentences.en: It should be a great week, with overnight stops in assorted hotels in the West Highlands.
sentences.cn: 那一周会过得很开心，晚上可以在西部高地上的各式旅馆里过夜。

sentences.en: Mom bought a box of assorted chocolates.
sentences.cn: 妈妈买了一盒什锦巧克力.

sentences.en: Most likely found: Expounding assorted conspiracy and cover - up theories.
sentences.cn: 最有可能被发现的: 阐释各种阴谋理论.

sentences.en: Rocks of assorted sizes and shapes are embeded in the bottom of a glacier.
sentences.cn: 多种尺寸和形状的岩石都埋藏在冰川的底部.

sentences.en: The jar contained assorted hard candies.
The jumper comes in assorted colours.
sentences.cn: 各种颜色的针织套衫一应俱全。

sentences.en: The meat is served with salad or assorted vegetables.
sentences.cn: 端上的肉配有色拉或什锦蔬菜。

sentences.en: There's a bag of assorted sweets on the table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有一袋什锦糖果.

sentences.en: They make an, ill - assorted ` couple , ie don't seem well suited to each other.
We have very nice assorted vegetables . Would you like to order some?
sentences.cn: 我们有很可口的素什锦. 您要来一点 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 把…分等级；把…归为一类（assort的过去分词）
